marklogic.body:
kcmark. I hear ya. Been high on what DM is doing since I watched his first 3 trades. He immediately reminded me of Joe Burke. And, I saw quickly that he understands how to build a competitive team in a small market. The farm system. Problem is, that is a very, very slow, arduous process. But, it's the only way to compete in a small market, where you can't just go buy any player you want.Â
I don't predict the Royals to make the playoffs this year. I think they are still a year away. But, I do predict that they will compete for a playoff Spot.Â And, the thing is with young teams like this, when they break out, it can be really sudden.
So. Here is my prediction. If the Royals are within 5 games of the Tigers by the all-star break, I think they will actually win the division. I think the Royals will keep getting stronger and stronger as the season progresses, and all their young players continue to develop.Â Problem is, I don't see them within 5 games of Detroit at the All Star break.
